page.title: 03SHOPPING IN BANKS/CROSSENS
page.content: BOTH BANKS AND CROSSENS HAVE THEIR OWN SMALL SHOPPING CENTRES.GENERALLY THE SHOPS ARE OF A SMALL NATURE AND ARE PRIVATELY OWNED. BANKS HAS A CHEMIST'S,BUTCHERS SHOPS, GROCERS,AN OFF LICENCE,NEWSAGENTS, CHIP SHOP,HAIRDRESSERS,POST OFFICE, CHAINSTORE GROCERS WITH BAKERY AND GREENGROCERY.THESE ARE ALL SITUATED ON OR NEAR THE MAIN ROAD THROUGH BANKS. CROSSENS HAS SIMILAR STORES ALONG ITS MAIN CENTRAL ROAD.RESIDENTS TEND TO SHOP IN THEIR OWN VILLAGE BUT ALSO DO A "BULK" SHOP IN NEARBY TOWNS ON A REGULAR BASIS.THE VILLAGE SHOPS PROVIDE A GOOD SERVICE AND EMPLOYMENT FOR LOCAL PEOPLE. IN ADDITION TO SHOPS THERE ARE SEVERAL MOBILE DELIVERY SERVICES WHICH SUPPLY THE VILLAGES.THESE INCLUDE A DRAPERS, A BAKERS,FISHMONGERS,BUTCHERS AND FRUIT AND VEGETABLE DELIVERIES.
